{"a8736084-8535-446b-ac96-add72be0c523":{"id":"a8736084-8535-446b-ac96-add72be0c523","name":"Flavor-driven multi-bank Android app: environment + bank variants with runtime feature flags","timestamp":1767558198154,"messages":[{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"ccreate app BankSuite with below details

A single banking app with environment-based and bank-based feature control.

 Requirements (from your example)
 Environments

dev

qa

staging

preprod

prod

 Bank Variants

Bank A

Bank B

Bank C

 Feature differences
Feature	Bank A	Bank B	Bank C
Savings Account	✅	✅	❌
Current Account	❌	✅	✅
Loans	✅	❌	❌
Credit Card	❌	❌	✅
UPI	✅	✅	✅
 Correct Flavor Architecture (IMPORTANT)

 Use Flavor Dimensions
This avoids chaos and matches enterprise practice.

flavorDimensions "env", "bank"

 Product Flavors Setup
android {

 flavorDimensions "env", "bank"

 productFlavors {

 // Environment flavors
 dev {
 dimension "env"
 applicationIdSuffix ".dev"
 versionNameSuffix "-dev"
 buildConfigField "String", "BASE_URL", "\"https://dev.api.bank.com\""
 }

 qa {
 dimension "env"
 applicationIdSuffix ".qa"
 buildConfigField "String", "BASE_URL", "\"https://qa.api.bank.com\""
 }

 staging {
 dimension "env"
 applicationIdSuffix ".stg"
 buildConfigField "String", "BASE_URL", "\"https://stg.api.bank.com\""
 }

 preprod {
 dimension "env"
 applicationIdSuffix ".pp"
 buildConfigField "String", "BASE_URL", "\"https://pp.api.bank.com\""
 }

 prod {
 dimension "env"
 buildConfigField "String", "BASE_URL", "\"https://api.bank.com\""
 }

 // Bank flavors
 bankA {
 dimension "bank"
 resValue "string", "app_name", "Bank A"
 buildConfigField "String", "BANK_CODE", "\"A\""
 }

 bankB {
 dimension "bank"
 resValue "string", "app_name", "Bank B"
 buildConfigField "String", "BANK_CODE", "\"B\""
 }

 bankC {
 dimension "bank"
 resValue "string", "app_name", "Bank C"
 buildConfigField "String", "BANK_CODE", "\"C\""
 }
 }
}

 Variant Explosion (Expected & Correct)
devBankADebug
qaBankADebug
stagingBankBDebug
preprodBankCDebug
prodBankCRelease


✔️ This is normal in banking apps
✔️ CI builds only selected variants

 Feature Control (BEST PRACTICE)
❌ Don’t hide logic inside Gradle only
✅ Use runtime feature config
Option 1: Feature Map (Recommended)
object FeatureConfig {

 fun isSavingsEnabled() =
 BuildConfig.BANK_CODE == "A" || BuildConfig.BANK_CODE == "B"

 fun isLoanEnabled() =
 BuildConfig.BANK_CODE == "A"

 fun isCreditCardEnabled() =
 BuildConfig.BANK_CODE == "C"
}


UI:

if (FeatureConfig.isLoanEnabled()) {
 showLoanCard()
}

Option 2: Flavor-specific source sets (Advanced)
src/bankA/java/.../LoanRepository.kt
src/bankB/java/.../LoanRepository.kt


Used when logic differs, not just UI.

 Banking-Grade Extras (Very Important)
 Logging control
buildConfigField "boolean", "ENABLE_LOGS", "false"


Disable logs in:

prod

release

 Analytics & Crashlytics
Env	Enabled
dev	❌
qa	❌
staging	✅
prod	✅
 API certificates / pinning

Different certs per:

preprod

prod

 Recommended Folder Structure
src/
 ├── dev/
 ├── qa/
 ├── staging/
 ├── preprod/
 ├── prod/
 ├── bankA/
 ├── bankB/
 ├── bankC/


Only override when needed.

 Testing Strategy
Env	Purpose
dev	Developer testing
qa	QA automation
staging	UAT
preprod	Prod-like final check
prod	Play Store
 Interview-Ready Explanation (Say This)

“We use two flavor dimensions: environment and bank.
Environment controls backend URLs, logging, and analytics.
Bank flavors control branding and feature availability.
Runtime feature flags decide UI visibility, while flavor source sets handle bank-specific logic.”"}],"context":[{"file_path":"app/src/main/java/me/rohinee/banksuite/MainActivity.kt","code_text":"package me.rohinee.banksuite

import android.os.Bundle
import androidx.activity.ComponentActivity
import androidx.activity.compose.setContent
import androidx.activity.enableEdgeToEdge
import androidx.compose.foundation.layout.fillMaxSize
import androidx.compose.foundation.layout.padding
import androidx.compose.material3.Scaffold
import androidx.compose.material3.Text
import androidx.compose.runtime.Composable
import androidx.compose.ui.Modifier
import androidx.compose.ui.tooling.preview.Preview
import me.rohinee.banksuite.ui.theme.BankSuiteTheme

class MainActivity : ComponentActivity() {
 override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
 super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
 enableEdgeToEdge()
 setContent {
 BankSuiteTheme {
 Scaffold(modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize()) { innerPadding ->
 Greeting(
 name = "Android",
 modifier = Modifier.padding(innerPadding)
 )
 }
 }
 }
 }
}

@Composable
fun Greeting(name: String, modifier: Modifier = Modifier) {
 Text(
 text = "Hello $name!",
 modifier = modifier
 )
}

@Preview(showBackground = true)
@Composable
fun GreetingPreview() {
 BankSuiteTheme {
 Greeting("Android")
 }

"/Users/rohineemisal/AndroidStudioProjects/BankSuite/app/src/main/java/me/rohinee/banksuite/config/FeatureConfig.kt", "content": "package me.rohinee.banksuite.config\n\nimport me.rohinee.banksuite.BuildConfig\n\n/**\n * Runtime feature configuration based on BuildConfig bank code.\n * This enables/disable features per bank variant.\n */\nobject FeatureConfig {\n\n /**\n * Returns the current bank code from BuildConfig\n */\n fun getBankCode(): String = BuildConfig.BANK_CODE\n\n /**\n * Returns the current environment name (derived from BASE_URL)\n */\n fun getEnvironment(): String = when {\n BuildConfig.BASE_URL.contains(\"dev\") -> \"dev\"\n BuildConfig.BASE_URL.contains(\"qa\") -> \"qa\"\n BuildConfig.BASE_URL.contains(\"stg\") -> \"staging\"\n BuildConfig.BASE_URL.contains(\"pp\") -> \"preprod\"\n else -> \"prod\"\n }\n\n // === Feature Flags ===\n\n /**\n * Savings Account feature\n * Enabled for: Bank A, Bank B\n * Disabled for: Bank C\n */\n fun isSavingsAccountEnabled(): Boolean =\n BuildConfig.BANK_CODE == \"A\" || BuildConfig.BANK_CODE == \"B\"\n\n /**\n * Current Account feature\n * Enabled for: Bank B, Bank C\n * Disabled for: Bank A\n */\n fun isCurrentAccountEnabled(): Boolean =\n BuildConfig.BANK_CODE == \"B\" || BuildConfig.BANK_CODE == \"C\"\n\n /**\n * Loans feature\n * Enabled for: Bank A\n * Disabled for: Bank B, Bank C\n */\n fun isLoansEnabled(): Boolean =\n BuildConfig.BANK_CODE == \"A\"\n\n /**\n * Credit Card feature\n * Enabled for: Bank C\n * Disabled for: Bank A, Bank B\n */\n fun isCreditCardEnabled(): Boolean =\n BuildConfig.BANK_CODE == \"C\"\n\n /**\n * UPI feature\n * Enabled for: All banks\n */\n fun isUPIEnabled(): Boolean = true\n\n /**\n * Logging enabled check\n * Based on ENABLE_LOGS BuildConfig field\n */\n fun isLoggingEnabled(): Boolean = BuildConfig.ENABLE_LOGS\n\n /**\n * Analytics enabled check\n * Based on ENABLE_ANALYTICS BuildConfig field\n */\n fun isAnalyticsEnabled(): Boolean = BuildConfig.ENABLE_ANALYTICS\n\n /**\n * Returns a list of all enabled features for the current bank\n */\n fun getEnabledFeatures(): List<String> {\n val features = mutableListOf<String>()\n\n if (isSavingsAccountEnabled()) features.add(\"Savings Account\")\n if (isCurrentAccountEnabled()) features.add(\"Current Account\")\n if (isLoansEnabled()) features.add(\"Loans\")\n if (isCreditCardEnabled()) features.add(\"Credit Card\")\n if (isUPIEnabled()) features.add(\"UPI\")\n\n return features\n }\n\n /**\n * Returns app info for debugging\n */\n fun getAppInfo(): String {\n return \"\"\"\n Bank: ${getBankName()}\n Environment: ${getEnvironment()}\n Base URL: ${BuildConfig.BASE_URL}\n Version: ${BuildConfig.VERSION_NAME}\n Logging: me.rohinee.banksuite.config.FeatureConfig\nimport me.rohinee.banksuite.ui.theme.BankSuiteTheme\n\nclass MainActivity : ComponentActivity() {\n override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {\n super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)\n enableEdgeToEdge()\n\n // Log app info\n AppLogger.i(\"MainActivity\", FeatureConfig.getAppInfo())\n\n setContent {\n BankSuiteTheme {\n Scaffold(\n topBar = {\n TopAppBar {\n Text(\n text = FeatureConfig.getBankName(),\n style = MaterialTheme.typography.headlineSmall,\n fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold\n )\n }\n }\n ) { innerPadding ->\n BankingDashboard(\n modifier = Modifier\n .padding(innerPadding)\n .fillMaxSize()\n )\n }\n }\n }\n }\n}\n\n@OptIn(ExperimentalMaterial3Api::class)\n@Composable\nfun TopAppBar(title: @Composable () -> Unit) {\n TopAppBar(\n title = title,\n colors = TopAppBarDefaults.topAppBarColors(\n containerColor = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primaryContainer,\n titleContentColor = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onPrimaryContainer\n )\n )\n}\n\n@Composable\nfun BankingDashboard(modifier: Modifier = Modifier) {\n Column(modifier = modifier.padding(16.dp)) {\n // Environment Info Card\n EnvironmentInfoCard()\n\n Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(24.dp))\n\n // Features Section\n Text(\n text = \"Available Services\",\n style = MaterialTheme.typography.titleLarge,\n fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold\n )\n\n Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(16.dp))\n\n // Feature Cards\n FeatureGrid()\n\n Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(24.dp))\n\n // App Info Section\n Text(\n text = \"App Information\",\n style = MaterialTheme.typography.titleLarge,\n fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold\n )\n\n Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(16.dp))\n\n AppInfoCard()\n }\n}\n\n@Composable\nfun EnvironmentInfoCard() {\n Card(\n modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),\n colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(\n containerColor = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.secondaryContainer\n )\n ) {\n Column(modifier = Modifier.padding(16.dp)) {\n Text(\n text = \"Current Environment\",\n style = MaterialTheme.typography.titleMedium,\n fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold\n )\n Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(8.dp))\n InfoRow(\"Environment\", FeatureConfig.getEnvironment())\n InfoRow(\"Bank Code\", FeatureConfig.getBankCode())\n InfoRow(\"API Base URL\", FeatureConfig.getEnvironment())\n }\n }\n}\n\n@Composable\nfun FeatureGrid() {\n val features = getFeatureItems()\n\n Column(modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()) {\n features.chunked(2).forEach { row ->\n Row(\n modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),\n horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(12.dp)\n ) {\n row.forEach { feature ->\n FeatureCard(\n feature = feature,\n modifier = Modifier.weight(1f)\n )\n }\n // Fill empty space if odd number\n if (row.size == 1) {\n Spacer(modifier = Modifier.weight(1f))\n }\n }\n Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(12.dp))\n }\n }\n}\n\n@Composable\nfun FeatureCard(feature: FeatureItem, modifier: Modifier = Modifier) {\n Card(\n modifier = modifier.height(120.dp),\n colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(\n containerColor = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primaryContainer\n ),\n shape = RoundedCornerShape(12.dp)\n ) {\n Box(\n modifier = Modifier\n .fillMaxSize()\n .padding(12.dp),\n contentAlignment = Alignment.Center\n ) {\n Column(\n horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally\n ) {\n Icon(\n imageVector = feature.icon,\n contentDescription = feature.name,\n tint = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primary,\n modifier = Modifier.size(32.dp)\n )\n Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(8.dp))\n Text(\n text = feature.name,\n style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodySmall,\n fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium\n )\n }\n }\n }\n}\n\n@Composable\nfun AppInfoCard() {\n Card(\n modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),\n colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(\n containerColor = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.tertiaryContainer\n )\n ) {\n Column(modifier = Modifier.padding(16.dp)) {\n InfoRow(\"Version\", \"1.0\")\n InfoRow(\"Logging Enabled\", FeatureConfig.isLoggingEnabled().toString())\n InfoRow(\"Analytics Enabled\", FeatureConfig.isAnalyticsEnabled().toString())\n }\n }\n}\n\n@Composable\nfun InfoRow(label: String, value: String) {\n Row(\n modifier = Modifier\n .fillMaxWidth()\n .padding(vertical = 4.dp),\n horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.SpaceBetween\n ) {\n Text(\n text = label,\n style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodyMedium,\n color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onSurfaceVariant\n )\n Text(\n text = value,\n style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodyMedium,\n fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,\n color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primary\n )\n }\n}\n\ndata class FeatureItem(\n val name: String,\n val icon: ImageVector,\n val enabled: Boolean\n)\n\nfun getFeatureItems(): List<FeatureItem> {\n return listOf(\n FeatureItem(\"Savings Account\", Icons.Default.AccountBalance, FeatureConfig.isSavingsAccountEnabled()),\n FeatureItem(\"Current Account\", Icons.Default.Money, FeatureConfig.isCurrentAccountEnabled()),\n FeatureItem(\"Loans\", Icons.Default.MonetizationOn, FeatureConfig.isLoansEnabled()),\n FeatureItem(\"Credit Card\", Icons.Default.CreditCard, FeatureConfig.isCreditCardEnabled()),\n FeatureItem(\"UPI\", Icons.Default.Phone, )\n}"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"write","tool_call_id":"chatcmpl-tool-9b4fc80ef06e9bff","content":"Wrote contents to = null) {\n if (FeatureConfig.isAnalyticsEnabled()) {\n AppLogger.i(\"AnalyticsConfig\", \"Screen tracked: $screenName\")\n }\n }\n\n /**\n * Track user property\n */\n fun setUserProperty(name: String, value: String) {\n if (FeatureConfig.isAnalyticsEnabled()) {\n AppLogger.i(\"AnalyticsConfig\", \"User property set: $name = $value\")\n }\n }\n\n /**\n * Set user ID for analytics\n */\n fun setUserId(userId: String) {\n if (FeatureConfig.isAnalyticsEnabled()) {\n AppLogger.i(\"AnalyticsConfig\", \"User ID set: $userId\")\n }\n }\n\n /**\n * Enable/disable analytics at runtime (useful для testing)\n */\n fun setAnalyticsEnabled(enabled: Boolean) {\n if (FeatureConfig.isAnalyticsEnabled()) {\n // Override or control analytics SDK at runtime\n AppLogger.i(\"AnalyticsConfig\", \"Analytics runtime override: $enabled\")\n }\n }\n\n /**\n * Check if analytics is enabled both at build time and runtime\n */\n fun canTrack(): Boolean = FeatureConfig.isAnalyticsEnabled()\n\n /**\n * Flush analytics events (if your SDK supports batching)\n */\n fun flush() {\n if (FeatureConfig.isAnalyticsEnabled()) {\n AppLogger.i(\"AnalyticsConfig\", \"Analytics flushed\")\n }\n }\n}"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"write","tool_call_id":"chatcmpl-tool-85ddbfb59436cff2","content":"Wrote contents to /Users/rohineemisal/AndroidStudioProjects/BankSuite/app/src/main/java/me/rohinee/banksuite/config/AnalyticsConfig.kt.

When you're done with your current set of changes to this file, you should call the read_lints tool with the specific file path and fix any newly introduced errors."},{"role":"assistant","content":[],"tool_calls":[{"id":"chatcmpl-tool-87e7da4a5c60f44e","type":"function","function":{"name":"write","arguments":"{"file_path": "/Users/rohineemisal/AndroidStudioProjects/BankSuite/README.md", "content": "# BankSuite - Multi-Environment, Multi-Bank Android App\n\nA comprehensive banking application demonstrating enterprise-grade feature control using Android Build Variants with Flavor Dimensions.\n\n## ️ Architecture Overview\n\nThis app uses **Flavor Dimensions** to manage:\n- **Environment**: dev, qa, staging, preprod, prod\n- **Bank Variants**: Bank A, Bank B, Bank C\n\n## Feature Matrix\n\n| Feature | Bank A | Bank B | Bank C |\n|------------------|--------|--------|--------|\n| Savings Account | ✅ | ✅ | ❌ |\n| Current Account | ❌ | ✅ | ✅ |\n| Loans | ✅ | ❌ | ❌ |\n| Credit Card | ❌ | ❌ | ✅ |\n| UPI | ✅ | ✅ | ✅ |\n\n## Build Variants (Available Combinations)\n\nThis architecture generates **15 variants** (5 environments × 3 banks):\n\n```\ndevBankADebug, devBankADebug, devBRelease, ...\nqaBankADebug, qaBankBRelease, ...\nstagingBankBDebug, stagingBankCRelease, ...\npreprodBankADebug, preprodBankBRelease, ...\nprodBankADebug, prodBankCRelease, ...\n```\n\n### Example Full Variants:\n- `devBankADebug`\n- `qaBankBDebug`\n- `stagingBankCRelease`\n- `preprodBankADebug`\n- `prodBankCRelease`\n\n## ️ How to Build\n\n### Using Android Studio\n1. **Select Build Variant**: View → Tool Windows → Build Variants\n2. Choose from available variants (e.g., `devBankADebug`, `prodBankCRelease`)\n3. Click **Run** or **Build → Make Project**\n\n### Using Command Line\n\n```bash\n# Build specific variant\n./gradlew assembleDevBankADebug\n./gradlew assembleProdBankCRelease\n\n# Install on connected device\n./gradlew installDevBankADebug\n./gradlew installProdBankCRelease\n\n# Build all variants (for CI/CD)\n./gradlew assembleDebug\n./gradlew assembleRelease\n```\n\n## Project Structure\n\n```\napp/\n├── src/\n│ ├── main/ # Common source code\n│ │ ├── java/me/rohinee/banksuite/\n│ │ │ ├── config/\n│ │ │ │ ├── FeatureConfig.kt # Runtime feature flags\n│ │ │ │ ├── AnalyticsConfig.kt # Analytics configuration\n│ │ │ │ └── AppLogger.kt # Logging utility\n│ │ │ ├── MainActivity.kt # Main UI\n│ │ │ └── BankSuiteApplication.kt # Application class\n│ │ └── res/\n│ ├── dev/ # Environment-specific overrides\n│ ├── qa/\n│ ├── staging/\n│ ├── preprod/\n│ ├── prod/\n│ ├── bankA/ # Bank-specific code (if needed)\n│ ├── bankB/\n│ └── bankC/\n└── build.gradle.kts # App-level build configuration\n```\n\n## Key Components\n\n### 1. FeatureConfig.kt - Runtime Feature Control\n\n```kotlin\n// Check if a feature is enabled\nif (FeatureConfig.isSavingsAccountEnabled()) {\n showSavingsAccountUI()\n}\n\n// Get current bank info\nval bankName = FeatureConfig.getBankName()\nval environment = FeatureConfig.getEnvironment()\n\n// Get all enabled features\nval features = FeatureConfig.getEnabledFeatures()\n```\n\n### 2. Build Configuration\n\n#### Environment Flavors\n| Flavor | App ID Suffix | Base URL | Analytics |\n|--------|--------------|----------------------------|-----------|\n| dev | `.dev` | `https://dev.api.bank.com` | ❌ |\n| qa | `.qa` | `https://qa.api.bank.com` | ❌ |\n| staging| `.stg` | `https://stg.api.bank.com` | ✅ |\n| preprod| `.pp` | `https://pp.api.bank.com` | ✅ |\n| prod | (none) | `https://api.bank.com` | ✅ |\n\n#### Bank Flavors\n| Flavor | App Name | Bank Code |\n|--------|------------|-----------|\n| bankA | Bank A | A |\n| bankB | Bank B | B |\n| bankC | Bank C | C |\n\n### 3. Logging & Analytics\n\n```kotlin\n// Logging - automatically disabled in prod/release builds\nAppLogger.d(\"MainActivity\", \"Debug message\")\nAppLogger.i(\"MainActivity\", \"Info message\")\nAppLogger.e(\"MainActivity\", \"Error message\", exception)\n\n// Analytics - only enabled for staging/preprod/prod\nAnalyticsConfig.initialize(context)\nAnalyticsConfig.trackEvent(\"button_clicked\", mapOf(\"screen\" to \"dashboard\"))\nAnalyticsConfig.trackScreen(\"Dashboard\")\n```\n\n## Banking-Grade Features\n\n### Logging Control\n- **Debug Builds**: Logging enabled in all environments\n- **Release Builds**: Logging disabled for security\n\n### Analytics Configuration\n| Environment | Analytics | Notes |\n|-------------|-----------|-----------------|\n| dev | ❌ | Development only |\n| qa | ❌ | Automation only |\n| staging | ✅ | UAT phase |\n| preprod | ✅ | Prod-like test |\n| prod | ✅ | Production tracking|\n\n## Testing Strategy\n\n| Environment | Purpose | Users |\n|-------------|--------------------------------|---------------------|\n| dev | Daily developer testing | Developers |\n| qa | Automated testing | QA Automation |\n| staging | User Acceptance Testing (UAT) | QA & Stakeholders |\n| preprod | Final pre-production checks | QA & DevOps |\n| prod | App Store / Production | End Users |\n\n## Customization\n\n### Adding a New Bank\n\n1. Add bank flavor in `app/build.gradle.kts`:\n\n```kotlin\ncreate(\"bankD\") {\n dimension = \"bank\"\n resValue(\"string\", \"app_name\", \"Bank D\")\n buildConfigField(\"String\", \"BANK_CODE\", \"\\\"D\\\"\")\n}\n```\n\n2. Update `FeatureConfig.kt` with bank-specific features:\n\n```kotlin\nfun isNewFeatureEnabled(): Boolean =\n BuildConfig.BANK_CODE == \"D\"\n```\n\n3. Optionally create `app/src/bankD/` for bank-specific code\n\n### Adding a New Environment\n\n1. Add environment flavor in `app/build.gradle.kts`:\n\n```kotlin\ncreate(\"uat\") {\n dimension = \"env\"\n applicationIdSuffix = \".uat\"\n buildConfigField(\"String\", \"BASE_URL\", \"\\\"https://uat.api.bank.com\\\"\")\n buildConfigField(\"boolean\", \"ENABLE_ANALYTICS\", \"true\")\n}\n```\n\n2. Create `app/src/uat/res/values/` for environment-specific resources\n\n## Sample Screens\n\nThe app displays:\n- **Environment Info Card**: Shows current environment and bank\n- **Feature Grid**: Dynamically shows enabled services based on bank\n- **App Information**: Build config details for debugging\n\n## CI/CD Considerations\n\n```yaml\n# Example: Build only specific variants in CI\ndev-builds:\n - devBankADebug\n - devBankBDebug \n - devBankCDebug\n\nprod-builds:\n - prodBankARelease\n - prodBankBRelease\n - prodBankCRelease\n```\n\n## Best Practices\n\n1. **Use runtime feature flags** for UI changes (FeatureConfig)\n2. **Use flavor source sets** only for completely different implementations\n3. **Never commit secrets** - use environment variables or secure storage\n4. **Disable logs in prod** - handled automatically via build configuration\n5. **Test all variants** - ensure each bank variant works correctly\n\n## Troubleshooting\n\n### Build Variant Not Showing\n- Sync Gradle: `./gradlew clean build`\n- Check Build Variant dropdown in Android Studio\n\n### BuildConfig Fields Not Generated\n- Add `buildConfig = true` in `buildFeatures` block\n- Clean and rebuild project\n\n### Flavor Resources Not Merging\n- Verify resource file names match across flavors\n- Check for naming conflicts\n\n## License\n\nThis is a sample project demonstrating Android build variants and flavor dimensions.\n\n---\n\n**Interview-Ready Explanation:**\n\n\"We use two flavor dimensions: environment and bank. Environment controls backend URLs, logging, and analytics. Bank flavors control branding and feature availability. Runtime feature flags decide UI visibility, while flavor source sets handle bank-specific logic.\""}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"write","tool_call_id":"chatcmpl-tool-87e7da4a5c60f44e","content":"Wrote contents to /Users/rohineemisal/AndroidStudioProjects/BankSuite/README.md.

### UI Components

import me.rohinee.banksuite.BuildConfig

/**
 * Runtime feature configuration based on BuildConfig bank code.
 * This enables/disable features per bank variant.
 */
object FeatureConfig {

 /**
 * Returns the current bank code from BuildConfig
 */
 fun getBankCode(): String = BuildConfig.BANK_CODE

 /**
 * Returns the current environment name (derived from BASE_URL)
 */
 fun getEnvironment(): String = when {
 BuildConfig.BASE_URL.contains("dev") -> "dev"
 BuildConfig.BASE_URL.contains("qa") -> "qa"
 BuildConfig.BASE_URL.contains("stg") -> "staging"
 BuildConfig.BASE_URL.contains("pp") -> "preprod"
 else -> "prod"
 }

 // === Feature Flags ===

 /**
 * Savings Account feature
 * Enabled for: Bank A, Bank B
 * Disabled for: Bank C
 */
 fun isSavingsAccountEnabled(): Boolean =
 BuildConfig.BANK_CODE == "A" || BuildConfig.BANK_CODE == "B"

 /**
 * Current Account feature
 * Enabled for: Bank B, Bank C
 * Disabled for: Bank A
 */
 fun isCurrentAccountEnabled(): Boolean =
 BuildConfig.BANK_CODE == "B" || BuildConfig.BANK_CODE == "C"

 /**
 * Loans feature
 * Enabled for: Bank A
 * Disabled for: Bank B, Bank C
 */
 fun isLoansEnabled(): Boolean =
 BuildConfig.BANK_CODE == "A"

 /**
 * Credit Card feature
 * Enabled for: Bank C
 * Disabled for: Bank A, Bank B
 */
 fun isCreditCardEnabled(): Boolean =
 BuildConfig.BANK_CODE == "C"

 /**
 * UPI feature
 * Enabled for: All banks
 */
 fun isUPIEnabled(): Boolean = true

 /**
 * Logging enabled check
 * Based on ENABLE_LOGS BuildConfig field
 */
 fun isLoggingEnabled(): Boolean = BuildConfig.ENABLE_LOGS

 /**
 * Analytics enabled check
 * Based on ENABLE_ANALYTICS BuildConfig field
 */
 fun isAnalyticsEnabled(): Boolean = BuildConfig.ENABLE_ANALYTICS

 /**
 * Returns a list of all enabled features for the current bank
 */
 fun getEnabledFeatures(): List<String> {
 val features = mutableListOf<String>()

 if (isSavingsAccountEnabled()) features.add("Savings Account")
 if (isCurrentAccountEnabled()) features.add("Current Account")
 if (isLoansEnabled()) features.add("Loans")
 if (isCreditCardEnabled()) features.add("Credit Card")
 if (isUPIEnabled()) features.add("UPI")

 return features
 }

 /**
 * Returns app info for debugging
 */
 fun getAppInfo(): String {
 return """
 Bank: ${getBankName()}
 Environment: ${getEnvironment()}
 Base URL: ${BuildConfig.BASE_URL}
 Version: ${BuildConfig.VERSION_NAME}
 Logging: ${isLoggingEnabled()}
 Analytics: ${isAnalyticsEnabled()}
 """.trimIndent()
 }

 /**
 * Returns the readable bank name
 */
 fun getBankName(): String = when (BuildConfig.BANK_CODE) {
 "A" -> "Bank A"
 "B" -> "Bank B"
 "C" -> "Bank C"
 else -> "Unknown Bank"
 }
}

/**
 * Utility for logging based on feature config
 */
object AppLogger {
 fun d(tag: String, message: String) {
 if (FeatureConfig.isLoggingEnabled()) {
 println("[$tag] DEBUG: $message")
 }
 }

 fun i(tag: String, message: String) {
 if (FeatureConfig.isLoggingEnabled()) {
 println("[$tag] INFO: $message")
 }
 }

 fun w(tag: String, message: String) {
 if (FeatureConfig.isLoggingEnabled()) {
 println("[$tag] WARN: $message")
 }
 }

 fun e(tag: String, message: String, throwable: Throwable? = null) {
 if (FeatureConfig.isLoggingEnabled()) {
 println("[$tag] ERROR: $message")
 throwable?.let { it.printStackTrace() }
 }
 }

import android.os.Bundle
import androidx.activity.ComponentActivity
import androidx.activity.compose.setContent
import androidx.activity.enableEdgeToEdge
import androidx.compose.foundation.layout.*
import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.LazyColumn
import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.items
import androidx.compose.foundation.shape.RoundedCornerShape
import androidx.compose.material.icons.Icons
import androidx.compose.material.icons.filled.Home
import androidx.compose.material.icons.filled.Phone
import androidx.compose.material.icons.filled.Star
import androidx.compose.material.icons.filled.ShoppingCart
import androidx.compose.material.icons.filled.Favorite
import androidx.compose.material.icons.filled.Info
import androidx.compose.material3.*
import androidx.compose.runtime.Composable
import androidx.compose.ui.Alignment
import androidx.compose.ui.Modifier
import androidx.compose.ui.graphics.vector.ImageVector
import androidx.compose.ui.text.font.FontWeight
import androidx.compose.ui.unit.dp
import me.rohinee.banksuite.config.AppLogger
import me.rohinee.banksuite.config.FeatureConfig
import me.rohinee.banksuite.ui.theme.BankSuiteTheme

class MainActivity : ComponentActivity() {
 override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
 super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
 enableEdgeToEdge()

 // Log app info
 AppLogger.i("MainActivity", FeatureConfig.getAppInfo())

 setContent {
 BankSuiteTheme {
 Scaffold(
 topBar = {
 TopAppBar {
 Text(
 text = FeatureConfig.getBankName(),
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.headlineSmall,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold
 )
 }
 }
 ) { innerPadding ->
 BankingDashboard(
 modifier = Modifier
 .padding(innerPadding)
 .fillMaxSize()
 )
 }
 }
 }
 }
}

@OptIn(ExperimentalMaterial3Api::class)
@Composable
fun TopAppBar(title: @Composable () -> Unit) {
 TopAppBar(
 title = title,
 colors = TopAppBarDefaults.topAppBarColors(
 containerColor = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primaryContainer,
 titleContentColor = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onPrimaryContainer
 )
 )
}

@Composable
fun BankingDashboard(modifier: Modifier = Modifier) {
 Column(modifier = modifier.padding(16.dp)) {
 // Environment Info Card
 EnvironmentInfoCard()

 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(24.dp))

 // Features Section
 Text(
 text = "Available Services",
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.titleLarge,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold
 )

 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(16.dp))

 // Feature Cards
 FeatureGrid()

 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(24.dp))

 // App Info Section
 Text(
 text = "App Information",
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.titleLarge,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold
 )

 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(16.dp))

 AppInfoCard()
 }
}

@Composable
fun EnvironmentInfoCard() {
 Card(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(
 containerColor = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.secondaryContainer
 )
 ) {
 Column(modifier = Modifier.padding(16.dp)) {
 Text(
 text = "Current Environment",
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.titleMedium,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold
 )
 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(8.dp))
 InfoRow("Environment", FeatureConfig.getEnvironment())
 InfoRow("Bank Code", FeatureConfig.getBankCode())
 InfoRow("API Base URL", FeatureConfig.getEnvironment())
 }
 }
}

@Composable
fun FeatureGrid() {
 val features = getFeatureItems()

 Column(modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()) {
 features.chunked(2).forEach { row ->
 Row(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(12.dp)
 ) {
 row.forEach { feature ->
 FeatureCard(
 feature = feature,
 modifier = Modifier.weight(1f)
 )
 }
 // Fill empty space if odd number
 if (row.size == 1) {
 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.weight(1f))
 }
 }
 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(12.dp))
 }
 }
}

@Composable
fun FeatureCard(feature: FeatureItem, modifier: Modifier = Modifier) {
 Card(
 modifier = modifier.height(120.dp),
 colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(
 containerColor = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primaryContainer
 ),
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(12.dp)
 ) {
 Box(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .padding(12.dp),
 contentAlignment = Alignment.Center
 ) {
 Column(
 horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally
 ) {
 Icon(
 imageVector = feature.icon,
 contentDescription = feature.name,
 tint = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primary,
 modifier = Modifier.size(32.dp)
 )
 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(8.dp))
 Text(
 text = feature.name,
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodySmall,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium
 )
 }
 }
 }
}

@Composable
fun AppInfoCard() {
 Card(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(
 containerColor = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.tertiaryContainer
 )
 ) {
 Column(modifier = Modifier.padding(16.dp)) {
 InfoRow("Version", "1.0")
 InfoRow("Logging Enabled", FeatureConfig.isLoggingEnabled().toString())
 InfoRow("Analytics Enabled", FeatureConfig.isAnalyticsEnabled().toString())
 }
 }
}

@Composable
fun InfoRow(label: String, value: String) {
 Row(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .padding(vertical = 4.dp),
 horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.SpaceBetween
 ) {
 Text(
 text = label,
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodyMedium,
 color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onSurfaceVariant
 )
 Text(
 text = value,
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodyMedium,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
 color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primary
 )
 }
}

data class FeatureItem(
 val name: String,
 val icon: ImageVector,
 val enabled: Boolean
)

fun getFeatureItems(): List<FeatureItem> {
 return listOf(
 FeatureItem("Savings Account", Icons.Default.Star, FeatureConfig.isSavingsAccountEnabled()),
 FeatureItem("Current Account", Icons.Default.Home, FeatureConfig.isCurrentAccountEnabled()),
 FeatureItem("Loans", Icons.Default.ShoppingCart, FeatureConfig.isLoansEnabled()),
 FeatureItem("Credit Card", Icons.Default.Phone, FeatureConfig.isCreditCardEnabled()),
 FeatureItem("UPI", Icons.Default.Info, FeatureConfig.isUPIEnabled()),
 FeatureItem("Transactions", Icons.Default.Favorite, true),
 )

Represents secure transactions\n - Indicates trust and safety\n - Green color symbolizes \"go/safe\" status\n\n## Icon Files Structure\n\n```\napp/src/main/res/\n├── drawable/\n│ ├── ic_launcher_background.xml # Gradient blue background\n│ ├── ic_launcher_foreground.xml # Bank building + security badge\n│ ├── ic_notification.xml # Simplified version for notifications\n│ └── ic_splash.xml # Splash screen logo\n├── mipmap-anydpi-v26/\n│ ├── ic_launcher.xml # Adaptive icon (square)\n│ └── ic_launcher_round.xml # Adaptive icon (round)\n└── mipmap-{hdpi, mdpi, xhdpi, xxhdpi, xxxhdpi}/\n ├── ic_launcher.webp # Generated from adaptive icon\n └── ic_launcher_round.webp # Generated from adaptive icon\n```\n\n## Adaptive Icon Features\n\nThe app uses **Android Adaptive Icons**, which provide:\n\n- **Flexibility**: Different shapes on different devices (squircle, circle, rounded square, tear-drop, etc.)\n- **Layers**: Background and foreground layers are separated\n- **Visual Consistency**: Maintains identity across various Android devices\n- **Animation**: Supports home screen icon animations on supported launchers\n\n## Generating Different Variants\n\nAndroid automatically generates all mipmap assets from the adaptive icon definition. The system creates:\n- Standard launcher icons\n- Round launcher icons\n- Notification icons\n- Home screen icons in various shapes\n\n## Color Palette\n\n| Usage | Color | Hex Code |\n|-------|-------|----------|\n| Primary | Deep Blue | `#1A237E` |\n| Lighter Blue | Medium Blue | `#3950C3` |\n| Accent | Gold | `#FFD54F` |\n| Security | Green | `#4CAF50` |\n| Success | Green | `#4CAF50` |\n| Error | Red | `#F44336` |\n| Warning | Orange | `#FF9800` |\n| Info | Blue | `#2196F3` |\n\n## Modifying the Icon\n\n### To Change Colors\n\nEdit `ic_launcher_background.xml` for background colors:\n```xml\n<path\n android:fillColor=\"#YOUR_COLOR\"\n android:pathData=\"...\" />\n```\n\nEdit `ic_launcher_foreground.xml` for icon element colors.\n\n### To Change the Design\n\nThe icon is built using vector graphics (SVG paths). Modify the paths in:\n- `ic_launcher_foreground.xml` for the bank building and badge\n- `ic_launcher_background.xml` for the background gradient\n\n### To Add Brand-Specific Icons\n\nFor bank-specific icons, create flavor-specific drawable files:\n\n```bash\napp/src/bankA/res/drawable-xxhdpi/\n ic_launcher_foreground.xml\n```\n\n## Guidelines\n\n- ✅ Keep the design simple and recognizable at small sizes\n- ✅ Maintain contrast for accessibility\n- ✅ Follow Material Design icon guidelines\n- ✅ Test on different backgrounds\n- ✅ Ensure visibility in light and dark themes\n- ❌ Don't use too many colors\n- ❌ Don't add text to the icon\n- ❌ Don't use complex gradients\n\n## Splash Screen\n\nThe splash screen uses `ic_splash.xml` which features a larger version of the bank building centered on the primary blue background.\n\nTo use the splash screen theme in AndroidManifest.xml:\n\n```xml\n<activity\n android:name=\".SplashActivity\"\n android:theme=\"@style/Theme.BankSuite.Splash\"\n ...>\n```\n\n## Notification Icon\n\nThe notification icon (`ic_notification.xml`) is a simplified version of the main icon, optimized for the small notification area size.\n\n## Testing\n\nTest the icon on:\n1.
